name: 4 Kettlebell Lunge Variations for Athletic Performance
description: Four dynamic kettlebell lunge variations designed to enhance athletic performance. Each combines a lunge with an upper-body explosive movement for total-body power.

exercises.name: Lunge Clean to Press
exercises.description: Clean KB to rack while lunging forward, press overhead as you return to standing.
exercises.notes: Each side. Explosive clean and press.

exercises.name: Split Pass Thrust
exercises.description: In split stance, hold KB and thrust/pass between legs or overhead while maintaining the lunge.

exercises.name: Lunge Snatch
exercises.description: Lunge while snatching KB from floor to overhead in one explosive motion.

exercises.name: Step Back Swing
exercises.description: Step back into a reverse lunge while swinging KB between legs, drive forward to stand with swing.
exercises.notes: Neutral spine during swing. Each leg.

raw.caption: 4 athletic performance lunge variations
raw.visualSummary: A female athlete demonstrates four kettlebell lunge variations in a gym, multiple angles without narration.

uncertainties: Split Pass Thrust technique inferred from name and visuals
